title: Cultural Hub
description: When you make your venue's wealth roll and your venue has surplus, choose a different hard zone location. Your venue's gossip & news includes gossip and news from that location too.

title: The Devil with a Blade
description: When you use a blade to **attack someone** or **do battle**, you get +1choice.

title: Fingers in Every Pie (+Cool)
description: Put out the word that you want a thing — could be a person, could be somethin somethin, could even be just a thing — and roll+Cool.

outcomes.text: It shows up for you, like magic.
Well, your people make an effort and everybody wants to please you and close is close, right?
It shows up for you with strings wicked attached.

title: Everybody Eats, Even That Guy (+Cool)
description: When you want to know something about someone important (your call), roll+Cool.

bullets: How are they doing? What's up with them?
What or who do they love best?
Who do they know, like and/or trust?
When next should I expect to see them?
How could I get to them, physically or emotionally?

outcomes.text: Ask 1 anyway, but they hear about your interest in them.

title: Just Give Me a Motive (+Hard or +Hx)
description: Name somebody who might conceivably eat, drink, or otherwise ingest something you've touched. If it's an NPC, roll+Hard; a PC, roll+Hx.

outcomes.text: They do, and suffer 4-harm (ap) sometime during the next 24 hours.
Some several people of the MC's choice, maybe including your guy maybe not, get it, and all suffer 3-harm (ap).

title: Improvements
description: Choose 2 Maestro D moves. At 6Xp, choose an improvement and erase.
pick: Get +1Aggro (max Aggro+3)
Get +1Cool (max Cool+3)
Get +1Hard (max Hard+3)
Get +1Sharp (max Sharp+3)
Get a new Maestro D move
Get a new Maestro D move
Get a new Maestro D move
Get a **holding** and **wealth**
Get a move from an unused playbook
Get a move from an unused playbook

title: Improvements
description: Choose 2 Maestro D moves. Your venue gives you wealth + it’s always something, and its options might give you leadership as well. At 6Xp, choose an improvement and erase.
pick: Get +1Cool (max Cool+3)
Get +1Hard (max Hard+3)
Get +1Sharp (max Sharp+3)
Get +1Weird (max Weird+3)
Get a new Maestro D move
Get a new Maestro D move
Add a security option to your venue
Get 3 ports of call and ear to the ground
